@sebastienlorber @erquhart @jamstatic_fr @Netlify @kylemathews The tough thing is in building just the chosen pages or sections instead of the entire site. There are techniques for sharding your site into more manageable chunks so that you don't need to regenerate millions of pages for each build, but it certainly does get challenging.
